intro: Licaria glaberrima, commonly known as the smooth licaria, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its simple, alternate leaves and showy, yellow flowers that bloom in clusters. It thrives in tropical and subtropical climates, often found in moist, shaded environments. Licaria glaberrima is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value due to its attractive floral display.
